participant_1.background:
I was a good son, but we grew apart when I chose to follow my passion.
I fear the day I will have to leave my room and interact with other people.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but my favorite place to eat is at my family's house.
my husband is a lawyer.
I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore.

content.text: I'm not sure if you have heard of this, but Pittsburgh is a very beautiful city.
That's awesome! I love going there. What do you enjoy doing there?
I like to take pictures of the city and go for walks along the river.
That sounds fun! I love taking pictures too. Do you ever post your pictures online?
Yes, I have an Instagram account where I post my pictures.
I'll have to check it out! I love seeing pictures of new places.
You're welcome! I also love trying new foods, have you ever tried any of the restaurants in Pittsburgh?
I have! I love Primanti Brothers.
Yes! Primanti Brothers is my favorite!
I'm glad you like it! I also love going to the museums in Pittsburgh.
Me too! I love the Carnegie Museum of Art.
We should go to the museum together sometime.
